rule.name: AC - CD
rule.documentation: Approve the renewal request for a patient with a diagnosis of moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD).

paramValues: C. moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD)

decisionOutcome.message: Approve for 12 months by GPID for all of the following strengths with no quantity limits:  Stelara 45mg/0.5mL vial; Stelara 45mg/0.5mL prefilled syringe; Stelara 90mg/mL prefilled syringe.  APPROVAL TEXT:  (IF APPLICABLE): The requested drug has a plan limit of [XX] per [XX] days.

rule.name: AC - Dx, HQ, No Pump
rule.documentation: Approve the renewal request for intravenous (IV) infusion of Stelara (ustekinumab) (GPID 42351) for the treatment of moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD) or moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC) if this is a pharmacy call or the requested medication is going to be filled at a pharmacy; the internal HQ code is AHF01, AHF02, ASP02, BAY01, BHP03, CHG09, CLC01, CLH01, CPL01, EHC01, GLD01, HTH05, MCX01, MRI03, MVS01, MVS09, MVS10, MVS11, PRW01, RPS01, UHC01; and the intravenous infusion is not administered via an external infusion pump.

paramValues: {(CUSTOMER SERVICE PAYMENT DETERMINATION FOR IV REQUESTS) Is the request for intravenous (IV) infusion of Stelara for the treatment of moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD) or moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC)?}
YES
{(CUSTOMER SERVICE PAYMENT DETERMINATION) Is this a pharmacy call?}
YES
{(CUSTOMER SERVICE PAYMENT DETERMINATION) Is the requested medication going to be filled at a pharmacy?}
YES

{(CUSTOMER SERVICE PAYMENT DETERMINATION) Is the internal HQ code AHF01, AHF02, ASP02, BAY01, BHP03, CHG09, CLC01, CLH01, CPL01, EHC01, GLD01, HTH05, MCX01, MRI03, MVS01, MVS09, MVS10, MVS11, PRW01, RPS01, UHC01?}
YES
{(CUSTOMER SERVICE PAYMENT DETERMINATION) Is the intravenous infusion administered via an external infusion pump?}
NO

decisionOutcome.message: (CUSTOMER SERVICE) PAYMENT DETERMINATION:  Approve for 12 months by HICL under Part D (Populate the B vs. D field with a 'D' in the PA override field).  APPROVAL TEXT:  No approval text provided.

rule.name: AC - Plaque Psoriasis
rule.documentation: Approve the renewal request for a patient with a diagnosis of moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO); and the patient continues to benefit from the medication.

paramValues: B. moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO)
1. Does the patient continue to benefit from the medication?
YES

decisionOutcome.message: Approve for 12 months by GPID for all of the following strengths with no quantity limits:  Stelara 45mg/0.5mL vial; Stelara 45mg/0.5mL prefilled syringe; Stelara 90mg/mL prefilled syringe.  APPROVAL TEXT:  (IF APPLICABLE): The requested drug has a plan limit of [XX] per [XX] days.

rule.documentation: Approve the renewal request if the diagnosis is psoriatic arthritis (PsA); and the patient continues to benefit from the medication.

paramValues: A. psoriatic arthritis (PsA)
1. Does the patient continue to benefit from the medication?
YES

decisionOutcome.message: Approve for 12 months by GPID for all of the following strengths with no quantity limits:  Stelara 45mg/0.5mL vial; Stelara 45mg/0.5mL prefilled syringe; Stelara 90mg/mL prefilled syringe.  APPROVAL TEXT:  (IF APPLICABLE): The requested drug has a plan limit of [XX] per [XX] days.

rule.name: Dx
rule.documentation: Deny the renewal request if the diagnosis is not psoriatic arthritis, moderate to severe plaque psoriasis, moderate to severe Crohn's disease, or moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC).

paramValues: A. psoriatic arthritis (PsA)
B. moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO)
C. moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD)
D. moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC)

decisionOutcome.message: NOTE:  Do not approve. Some terms are already pre-defined in parenthesis. Please use these definitions if the particular text you need to use does not already have definition(s) in it.  DENIAL TEXT:  Our guideline named USTEKINUMAB (Stelara) requires the following rules be met for renewal: A. You have ONE of the following diagnoses: 1. Psoriatic arthritis (PsA: a type of skin or joint condition), 2. Moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO: a type of skin condition), 3. Moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD: a type of bowel disorders), 4. Moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC: a type of digestive disorders). B. If you have psoriatic arthritis or moderate to severe plaque psoriasis, renewal also requires: 1. You continue to benefit from the medication. Your doctor told us [INSERT PT SPECIFIC INFO PROVIDED]. We do not have information showing you [INSERT UNMET CRITERIA]. This is why your request is denied. Please work with your doctor to use a different medication or get us more information if it will allow us to approve this request.

rule.name: IV
rule.documentation: Requires further review for Stelara 130mg/26mL intravenous (GPID 42351) if the diagnosis is psoriatic arthritis (PsA), moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO), moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD), or moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC).

paramValues: A. psoriatic arthritis (PsA)
B. moderate to severe plaque psoriasis (PsO)
C. moderate to severe Crohn's disease (CD)
D. moderate to severe ulcerative colitis (UC)

decisionOutcome.message: NOTE:  Send to clinical for review.

rule.name: PsA, Improvement
rule.documentation: Deny the renewal request if the diagnosis is psoriatic arthritis (PsA); and the patient did not continue to benefit from the medication.

paramValues: A. psoriatic arthritis (PsA)
1. Does the patient continue to benefit from the medication?
NO

decisionOutcome.message: NOTE:  Refer to plan. (The health plan makes the final payment determination decision) For CSR's: refer the caller to contact the plan, provide the plan's phone number, and advise that the plan will make the UNSAID BvD Prior Authorization Payment determination and Clinical determination for this particular product. (Do Not Enter any override). For PAC's: Send an email to plan (reference UNSAID section of PACIP).
